teststorydesc: The provider reviews the available inventory following vaccine administrations used during the day.
preCondition:
Vaccine inventory entered.
Vaccines administered for Juana Mariana Vazquez, Juan Marcel Marina, and Juana Maria Gonzales.
testObjectives: Update Vaccine Inventory from Patient Dosage Administration: The system updates the vaccine inventory to assure the correct count of remaining available vaccine inventory.
evaluationCriteria: Evaluation criteria is defined within each test step.
notes: This test step is introduced in 2018 and will be considered an evaluation year for the test step. Tester should document feedback and issues.
